author: cbs8
title: Smart Glass - Global Strategic Business Report 2015-2020 - Smart Glass Innovations & Advancements Spearheading Growth
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Oct. 20, Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/8bnb4z/smart_glass ) has announced the addition of the "Smart Glass - Global Strategic Business Report" report to their offering.
This report analyzes the worldwide markets for Smart Glass in US$ Million. The Global market is further analyzed by the following End-Use Applications: Transportation, and Others. The report provides separate comprehensive analytics for the US, Canada , Japan , Europe , Asia-Pacific , and Rest of World.
Annual estimates and forecasts are provided for the period 2013 through 2020. Market data and analytics are derived from primary and secondary research. Company profiles are primarily based on public domain information including company URLs.
The report profiles 107 companies including many key and niche players such as
Active Glass Technologies PLC (UK) Asahi Glass Company Ltd. ( Japan ) Corning, Inc. (US) Essex Safety Glass Ltd. (UK) Flat Glass Industries Ltd. ( Australia ) Gentex Corporation (US) Glass Apps, LLC (US) Guardian Industries (US) Hitachi Chemical Group ( Japan ) InvisiShade, LLC (US) Nippon Sheet Glass Co., Ltd. ( Japan ) Pleotint, LLC (US) RavenBrick LLC (US) Research Frontiers Incorporated (US) Saint-Gobain SA ( France ) SAGE Electrochromics, Inc. (US) Schott Corporation (US) Scienstry, Inc. (US) Smartglass International Limited (UK) View, Inc. (US) Key Topics Covered:
1. Industry Overview
2. Competition
3. Market Trends, Issues & Drivers
4. Smart Glass Innovations & Advancements: Spearheading Growth
5. Product Overview
6. Product Innovations/Introductions
7. Recent Industry Activity
8. Focus On Select Players
9. Global Market Perspective
Total Companies Profiled: 107 (including Divisions/Subsidiaries - 114)
The United States (38) Canada (5) Japan (7) Europe (33) - France (3) - Germany (6) - The United Kingdom (15) - Italy (1) - Spain (2) - Rest of Europe (6) Asia-Pacific (Excluding Japan) (26) Africa (1) Middle East (4) For more information visit http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/8bnb4z/smart_glass
Media Contact:
Laura Wood , +353-1-481-1716, press@researchandmarkets.net
